description:
Yuki Aihara is a young girl playing an online game The World. Her character`s name in the game is Yuki-chin and she often plays together with Kyo and Sieg, the characters of http://anidb.net/ch9969 [Kyouko Tohno] and http://anidb.net/ch60065 [Tomonari Kasumi] respectively. Despite her appearance she is rather mature and knowledgeable.
She helps with http://anidb.net/ch60064 [Tokuoka`s] investigations because she is interested in what is happening in The World. Nevertheless, her help consist only of giving Tokuoka a contact on Kyouko Tohno.
name: Aihara Yuki
